summary: Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) is the main airport for Los Angeles, California. It's located 18 miles southwest of downtown and covers 3,500 acres with four runways. LAX is the eighth busiest airport worldwide, handling over 75 million passengers in 2023. It's a major international gateway, connecting passengers to places like Asia, Australia, Mexico, and Central America. Most travelers use LAX as their final destination, not just a connection. It's also a hub for many airlines. Other airports serve the Los Angeles area, but LAX is the largest and busiest.
title: Los Angeles International Airport
